pages.about: Luxury Charm: Exquisite Forest Miracle Room About Rooms Casino Order ABOUT Experience Elevated Hospitality at Forest Miracle. Where Luxury Meets Comfort. Welcome to Forest Miracle Nestled deep within the tranquil embrace of a pristine forest, Forest Miracle Hotel invites you to experience a harmonious blend of luxury and nature. Our retreat is a sanctuary where guests can unwind, rejuvenate, and reconnect with the essence of the natural world. Our Promise At Forest Miracle, our promise is to provide you with an unparalleled experience that seamlessly blends luxury with the tranquility of nature. From the moment you step into our sanctuary, you can expect: Serenity and Tranquility: Immerse yourself in the peaceful embrace of our pristine forest surroundings. Whether you choose to explore winding trails or unwind in the comfort of your beautifully appointed room, tranquility awaits at every turn. Exceptional Hospitality: Our dedicated team is committed to delivering personalized service with genuine warmth and attention to detail. From arrival to departure, we strive to anticipate your needs and exceed your expectations. Our Team At Forest Miracle, our dedicated team is committed to providing exceptional hospitality and personalized service. From the moment you arrive, our friendly staff ensures your every need is met with warmth and efficiency. Our team consists of passionate individuals who share a deep love for nature and a commitment to creating unforgettable experiences for our guests. From expert guides who lead immersive forest excursions to talented chefs who craft culinary delights using locally sourced ingredients, every member of our team plays a crucial role in enhancing your stay. Whether you seek adventure in the wilderness or prefer moments of tranquility by the fireplace, our team is here to ensure your time at Forest Miracle exceeds expectations. Together, we strive to make your stay not just a visit, but a transformative journey where you can immerse yourself in the magic of the forest and create cherished memories that linger long after you depart. Welcome to Forest Miracle, where luxury meets nature's embrace. 68 Fraser Ave, Kings Park WA 6005, Australia About Rooms Order +91-321-1246314 forestmiracle@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer
pages.casino: Casino - Exciting Games and Live Tournaments About Rooms Casino Order Enchanted Oasis: The Whispering Grove Casino Step into a realm where luck meets luxury amidst the ancient whispering grove. Welcome to The Whispering Grove Casino, where the thrill of gaming is complemented by the serene beauty of nature. Nestled deep within a pristine forest, our casino offers an unparalleled experience where every spin of the wheel and shuffle of the cards is enveloped in the enchanting ambiance of the woodland surroundings. To book Access Information for The Whispering Grove Casino: To experience the allure of The Whispering Grove Casino nestled within Forest Miracle Hotel, follow these steps to access our exclusive gaming venue: Hotel Guest Privileges: Guests staying at Forest Miracle Hotel enjoy direct access to The Whispering Grove Casino. Simply check-in at our hotel reception, and you'll have the convenience of exploring our casino's offerings just steps away from your luxurious accommodations. Non-Hotel Guests: If you're not staying at Forest Miracle Hotel but wish to visit The Whispering Grove Casino, you're welcome to do so by obtaining a day pass. Contact our concierge team for more information on availability and pricing for day passes, which include access to our casino's gaming floors, dining options, and entertainment venues. VIP Lounge Access: For a heightened experience, inquire about access to our exclusive VIP lounges within The Whispering Grove Casino. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or seeking a more private gaming experience, our VIP team can assist in arranging access to these luxurious retreats. Dress Code: To maintain the elegant atmosphere of our casino, we encourage smart casual attire for all guests. Please refrain from wearing overly casual or beachwear attire to ensure a comfortable and respectful environment for all visitors. Discover the enchanting blend of gaming excitement and natural beauty at The Whispering Grove Casino, where every visit promises a memorable experience surrounded by the serenity of the forest. Enchanted Games of Fortune: A Symphony of Chanc Indulge in the captivating allure of The Whispering Grove Casino's diverse array of games, each designed to weave an enchanting tapestry of excitement and chance. Nestled amidst the tranquil beauty of Forest Miracle Hotel, our casino offers an immersive gaming experience where luck and luxury converge. Whispering Slots of Serenity: Immerse yourself in a world of spinning reels and enticing jackpots with our collection of Whispering Slots. From classic favorites to cutting-edge video slots, each machine beckons with the promise of fortune amidst the soothing ambiance of the forest. Majestic Tables of Elegance: Take your place at our Majestic Tables of Elegance, where skill meets chance in games like blackjack, roulette, and poker. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice, our professional dealers ensure a refined gaming experience where strategy and luck intertwine. Enchanted Jackpot Pursuit: Pursue the ultimate thrill with our Enchanted Jackpot Pursuit, featuring progressive jackpot games that offer the chance to win life-changing sums. Feel the anticipation build as you spin, bet, and play your way towards a fortune amidst the mystical atmosphere of The Whispering Grove Casino. pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer | Palacio de Forest Miracle About Rooms Casino Order Disclaimer of liability Welcome to the disclaimer page of Forest Miracle Hotel and The Whispering Grove Casino. Here, we provide important information to ensure clarity and transparency about our policies and guidelines. Please read the following carefully: Age Restrictions: The Whispering Grove Casino welcomes guests aged 21 and above. Valid identification, such as a passport or driver's license, must be presented upon entry to verify age. Minors are not permitted in the gaming areas or to participate in any casino activities. Responsible Gaming: Forest Miracle Hotel and The Whispering Grove Casino are committed to promoting responsible gaming practices. We encourage our guests to gamble responsibly and within their means. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, please seek assistance from organizations such as Gamblers Anonymous or a similar support group. Dress Code: To maintain a sophisticated and respectful atmosphere, we enforce a smart casual dress code at The Whispering Grove Casino. Guests are encouraged to dress appropriately. Beachwear, sports attire, and overly casual clothing may not be permitted. Privacy and Security: We prioritize the privacy and security of our guests. Personal information collected during your visit, including but not limited to name, contact details, and payment information, is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Disclaimer of Liability: Forest Miracle Hotel and The Whispering Grove Casino are not liable for any loss or damage, including but not limited to personal injury, property damage, or financial loss, arising from participation in casino activities or use of hotel facilities. Guests participate at their own risk. Terms of Service: By accessing Forest Miracle Hotel or The Whispering Grove Casino, you agree to abide by our Terms of Service. These terms govern your use of our facilities and services and outline your responsibilities as a guest. Modification of Information: Forest Miracle Hotel reserves the right to modify or update the information on this disclaimer page at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review this page periodically for changes. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns regarding the information on this disclaimer page, please contact our Customer Service team. We are here to assist you and ensure your experience with us is enjoyable and fulfilling. By continuing to use this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by this disclaimer and the terms of use. 68 Fraser Ave, Kings Park WA 6005, Australia About Rooms Order +91-321-1246314 forestmiracle@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer
pages.index: Forest Miracle: Your Elegant Haven of Luxury About Rooms Casino Order Enchanting Retreat: Forest Miracle Hotel Immerse yourself in the serene surroundings of lush greenery and whispering trees, where every dawn brings with it a symphony of birdsong and every dusk bathes the forest in hues of gold. Whether you seek adventure or seek solace, Forest Miracle invites you to indulge in a rejuvenating escape unlike any other. Available rooms 12 Rooms booked 22 The end of the discount 10 days Rooms LUXURY EXPERIENCE Our Luxury Rooms Whispering Pine Suite: Step into a realm where the fragrance of pine trees mingles with the soft whispers of the wind. The Whispering Pine Suite offers a cozy retreat adorned with rustic wood furnishings and panoramic views of the towering trees outside. Relax in the warmth of a crackling fireplace or unwind in your private balcony, where the songbirds serenade you throughout the day. large bed 32 Inc TV Enchanted Oak Hideaway: Nestled among ancient oaks, this hideaway exudes an aura of mystery and tranquility. Imagine waking up to the gentle rustling of leaves and the dappling sunlight filtering through the branches. The Enchanted Oak Hideaway features handcrafted oak furniture, a luxurious canopy bed draped in silken linens, and a secluded garden where woodland creatures occasionally peek through the foliage. large bed 32 Inc TV Mystic Moss Retreat: Step into a realm where moss-covered stones and lush ferns create an ethereal atmosphere. The Mystic Moss Retreat beckons with its earthy tones and natural textures, inviting you to unwind in a deep soaking tub carved from local stone or to meditate amidst the verdant greenery that fills every corner. Embrace the soothing ambiance of this sanctuary where time seems to stand still. large bed 42 Inc TV See all rooms FACILITIES Local Activities Forest Trekking Adventures Embark on a guided trek through the ancient woodland surrounding Forest Miracle. Traverse winding trails lined with towering trees and discover hidden waterfalls cascading into crystal-clear pools. Forest Bathing and Meditation: Immerse yourself in the healing power of nature with our guided forest bathing and meditation sessions. Wander along tranquil paths where sunlight filters through the leaves, creating a serene atmosphere conducive to relaxation and mindfulness. Canopy Zip-lining Excursions: Experience the thrill of zip-lining through the treetops, soaring above the forest canopy like a bird in flight. Our exhilarating canopy tours provide breathtaking views of the lush landscape below. TESTIMONIALS Satisfied Customers Forest Miracle enveloped me in a cocoon of tranquility I didn't know I needed. The Whispering Pine Suite was like a warm embrace from nature itself, with its cozy fireplace and panoramic views. Waking up to the symphony of birds and falling asleep to the rustling of leaves felt like a dream within a dream. Can't wait to return to this sanctuary. Lost in Tranquility Standard Room Staying at the Enchanted Oak Hideaway was like stepping into a fairytale. The room felt like a secret hideout in the midst of ancient oaks, where time stood still and every detail whispered tales of woodland lore. The canopy bed was so comfortable, and the private garden was a haven of peace. This place truly captures the essence of magic. A Magical Escape Deluxe Room "The Mystic Moss Retreat at Forest Miracle was a soulful escape into serenity. The deep soaking tub carved from local stone was pure bliss, and the moss-covered surroundings created an ambiance that instantly calmed my mind. Nature's embrace felt so close here—I left feeling rejuvenated and deeply connected to the earth." Soulful Retreat Suite (Large Room) Zip-lining through the forest canopy at Forest Miracle was an adrenaline rush like no other. Flying above the lush greenery and spotting wildlife below was exhilarating. The guides were knowledgeable and made sure we felt safe throughout the adventure. It's a must-do for anyone looking to add a dash of thrill to their nature retreat! Adventure in the Canopy Standard Room Share Your Feedback Feedback Form: Leave Your Mark I accept the Privacy Policy Send message 68 Fraser Ave, Kings Park WA 6005, Australia About Rooms Order +91-321-1246314 forestmiracle@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer
pages.privacy-policy: Forest Miracle Privacy Policy: Your Privacy, Our Priority About Rooms Order Privacy Policy Welcome to Forest Miracle! Your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and this Privacy Policy details how we handle, use, and safeguard your personal information. 1. Information Collection: - We collect various types of personal data, such as your name, email address, and contact number, when you interact with our services, such as making a purchase or signing up for promotions. - Additionally, we automatically gather non-personal information like IP addresses, browser types, and device identifiers to enhance our website's functionality and user experience. 2. Use of Information: - Your personal data is primarily used to process orders, provide customer support, and communicate with you about our products and services. - Non-personal information is utilized for analytical purposes, such as tracking website traffic patterns and improving our marketing strategies. 3. Information Sharing: - We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in delivering our services and improving customer experience. 4. Data Security: - We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. 5. Your Choices: - You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information stored in our systems. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. 6. Policy Updates: - We reserve the right to revise or amend this Privacy Policy as needed. Any changes will be promptly communicated to you through our website or other appropriate channels. For any inquiries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at forestmiracle@gmail.com. Thank you for entrusting Forest Miracle with your privacy and choosing us for your pet care needs! Last Updated: April 2024 68 Fraser Ave, Kings Park WA 6005, Australia About Rooms Order +91-321-1246314 forestmiracle@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer

pages.terms-conditions: Forest Miracle Terms of Use: Guidelines for Your Online Experience About Rooms Order Forest Miracle Terms Welcome to Forest Miracle Hotel and The Whispering Grove Casino. Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our facilities and services. By accessing or using any part of our hotel or casino, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions, then you may not access our facilities or services. Reservations and Bookings: All reservations and bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by Forest Miracle Hotel. Guests must provide accurate and complete information during the reservation process. Cancellation policies vary depending on the type of booking and may incur charges. Please review specific booking terms when making a reservation. Guest Conduct: Guests must conduct themselves in a respectful manner towards staff and other guests. Any behavior deemed disruptive, abusive, or illegal will result in immediate removal from our premises without refund. Smoking is strictly prohibited in designated non-smoking areas. Designated smoking areas must be used for smoking. Payment and Charges: All rates and charges are displayed in the currency of the country where the hotel is located and are inclusive of applicable taxes. Additional charges may apply for extra services or amenities requested during your stay. Payment for bookings and services can be made by credit card or other accepted methods as specified by Forest Miracle Hotel. Liability and Damages: Forest Miracle Hotel and The Whispering Grove Casino are not liable for any loss or damage to personal property during your stay. Guests are responsible for any damage caused to hotel property or casino equipment due to negligence or intentional misconduct. Liability for personal injury or loss arising from participation in casino activities is limited to the extent permitted by law. Privacy and Security: Forest Miracle Hotel respects your privacy and protects your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Security measures are in place to safeguard your personal data from unauthorized access or disclosure. Modification of Terms: Forest Miracle Hotel reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review these Terms and Conditions periodically for changes. Governing Law: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where Forest Miracle Hotel is located. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction. 68 Fraser Ave, Kings Park WA 6005, Australia About Rooms Order +91-321-1246314 forestmiracle@gmail.com Terms of Use Privacy Policy Disclaimer
